data.title: Landmark at The Glen, Glenview
data.text:
10 Screens. The nearly 50-year-old specialized movie theatre chain Landmark Theatres broadens its presence in Glenview with this beautifully redesigned theatre within a vibrant lifestyle center.

Landmark Theatres has a long history in the Chicago area. We currently operate Landmark's Century Centre Cinema in Chicago.

Landmark Theatres is a recognized leader in the industry for providing its customers with consistently diverse and entertaining film products in a sophisticated adult-oriented atmosphere. Our theatres showcase a wide variety of filmsâ€”ranging from independent and foreign films to popular films from Hollywood. Landmark Theatres is the nation's largest theatre chain dedicated to exhibiting and marketing independent films.

PARKING: Plenty of free parking is located on site.
